verses.name: Leviticus 23:5
verses.text: In the fourteenth day of the first month at even is the Lord’s passover.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:6
verses.text: And on the fifteenth day of the same month is the feast of unleavened bread unto the Lord: seven days ye must eat unleavened bread.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:7
verses.text: In the first day ye shall have an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:8
verses.text: But ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord seven days: in the seventh day is an holy convocation: ye shall do no servile work therein.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:9
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
